module.name: inicol
module.short: Collection which can write itself to inifile.
module.descr: inicol contains an implementation of TCollection and TCollectionItem descendents which cooperate to read and write the collection from and to a .ini file. It uses the TCustomIniFile class for this.

element.name: TIniCollectionItem
element.short: Collection item with support for loading/saving from/to ini file

descr.p: TIniCollectionItem is a descendent which has some extra methods for saving/loading the item to or from an .ini file.

To use this class, a descendent should be made, and the SaveToIni and LoadFromIni methods should be overridden. They should implement the actual loading and saving. The loading and saving is always initiated by the methods in , and respectively.

element.name: TIniCollectionItem.SaveToIni
element.short: Method called when the item must be saved
element.descr: SaveToIni is called by when it saves this item. Descendent classes should override this method to save the data they need to save. All write methods of the TCustomIniFile instance passed in Ini can be used, as long as the writing happens in the section passed in Section.
element.errors: No checking is done to see whether the values are actually written to the correct section.

element.name: TIniCollectionItem.SaveToIni.Ini
element.short: TCustomIniFile instance to which the item should be saved

element.name: TIniCollectionItem.SaveToIni.Section
element.short: Section under which data should be saved.

element.name: TIniCollectionItem.LoadFromIni
element.short: Method called when the item must be loaded
element.descr: LoadFromIni is called by when it saves this item. Descendent classes should override this method to load the data they need to load. All read methods of the TCustomIniFile instance passed in Ini can be used, as long as the reading happens in the section passed in Section.
element.errors: No checking is done to see whether the values are actually read from the correct section.

element.name: TIniCollectionItem.LoadFromIni.Ini
element.short: TCustomIniFile instance from which the item should be loaded

element.name: TIniCollectionItem.LoadFromIni.Section
element.short: Section from which data should be loaded.

element.name: TIniCollectionItem.SaveToFile
element.descr: SaveToFile creates an instance of TIniFile with the indicated FileName calls SaveToIni to save the item to the indicated file in .ini format under the section Section
element.errors: An exception can occur if the file is not writeable.

element.name: TIniCollectionItem.SaveToFile.FileName
element.short: Name of file to which the item should be saved.

element.name: TIniCollectionItem.SaveToFile.Section
element.short: Section under which the item should be saved.

element.name: TIniCollectionItem.LoadFromFile
element.descr: LoadFromFile creates an instance of TMemIniFile and calls LoadFromIni to load the item from the indicated file in .ini format from the section Section.

element.name: TIniCollectionItem.LoadFromFile.FileName
element.short: Filename from which to load item

element.name: TIniCollectionItem.SectionName
element.descr: SectionName is the section name under which the item will be saved or from which it should be read. The read/write functions should be overridden in descendents to determine a unique section name within the .ini file.
